Class BaseObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseObjectConformable, java.lang.Comparable<BaseObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dock, Job, Person, Port, Ship, World

    public class BaseObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BaseObject>, BaseObjectConformable
    The basic object behind every other object. This object is designed to be the foundation object for this project. It contains several convenience constructors and functions
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    matrix
